title: Bug 32770 - Java application launch shortcut error doesn't help user
description: Bug 32770 - Java application launch shortcut error doesn't provide helpful information to the user. Additionally, the error message needs to be improved in terms of quality.
EB: The error message should contain a hint for the user on how to fix the problem. In this case, the message should say something like 'Launch failed: No file with a main type selected'.
SR: Open a java file containing a main method. Select a non-resource-based view (such as the Debug view). Click 'Debug As' > 'Java Application'.
